name: MagicArchitect
description:
...Which character will you use to construct the magic?


One Thousand and One Shooting!

Choose magic to earn a living, nurture and master it, and earn money!

You Can select magic and build!

Let's enjoy this roguelike......

Furthermore, you can choose your character! Challenge yourself in a new world and try various combinations of magic. Defeat enemies and obtain orbs to enhance your abilities as an adventurer!

With different characters and magic, players can customize their gameplay style. Each playthrough lasts only 3 minutes, allowing for trial and error!

Now, dive into the world of magic and utilize your unique strategies and skills to become the ultimate sorcerer! A new adventure awaits!
